```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=6, fig.height=4}
DiagrammeR::grViz("
digraph flowchart {
  node [fontname = Helvetica, shape = rectangle]        
  tab1 [label = '@@1']
  tab2 [label = '@@2']
  tab3 [label = '@@3']
  tab4 [label = '@@4']
  tab5 [label = '@@5']
  tab1 -> tab2;
  tab2 -> tab3;
  tab3 -> tab4;
  tab3 -> tab5;
}
[1]: 'Co-occurrence Tables'
[2]: 'Embeddings from SVD'
[3]: 'Sparse Regression'
[4]: 'WordCloud Visualization'
[5]: 'Network Analysis'
")
```
